headline: Andrew C. Clarke Joins ParkOhio Board of Directors
summary: CLEVELAND, OHIO, October 01, 2025--Park-Ohio Holdings Corp. (NASDAQ: PKOH) today announced that Andrew C. Clarke, former Chief Financial Officer of C.H. Robinson Worldwide, Inc. (NASDAQ: CHRW) was appointed to ParkOhio’s Board of Directors effective September 30, 2025. Mr. Clarke will be an independent director of the Company.
